summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant System and ratifying and confirming execution by the Mayor and City Comptroller pursuant to Ordinance 101736 of a Net Billing Agreement providing for purchase by the City of a portion of the electric power output of Nuclear Power Project No. 1 to be constructed by the Washington Public Power Supply System and for an exchange of power in connection therewith; and ratifying execution of an agreement providing for the disposition of Hanford New Production Reactor energy for 1974 and 1975.
